main event: A civilian witness saw a small, round, reddish object traveling slowly and silently in a straight path in Platteville, Colorado.
interesting points: The object was described as a dome-shaped object the size of a pea when held at arm's length.
The object was pulsating regularly and did not have any visible tail, trail, or exhaust.
The object was observed for about 5 minutes before fading to the south-southwest.
No sound was reported from the object.
The sighting occurred during the day in clear weather conditions.
